attributes.action: Hancock & Patel to be genuinely apologetic to the NHS esteemed workers!
attributes.additional_details: Be Genuinely apologetic, Demonstrate their apologies in action
attributes.background: the statement they have given on 10th and 11th April in regards to death of NHS staff and failure of provisions of PPE, is absolutely unacceptable

rejection.details:
It is not the responsible of Parliament or Government to require apologies from MPs, including Ministers, for statements they have made. That would be a matter for the individuals concerned.

You might like to sign and share this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302576
